The original report of Yasin Malik: s death was attributed to British public broadcaster the BBC by Pakistan's Channel 5 News.
The original video report was taken down: but it continued to circulate on social media platforms.
The BBC denied reporting Malik: s death and urged people to verify stories on social media by visiting the BBC News website.
Multiple credible sources: including a senior police officer, Tihar Jail spokesperson, and Malik's lawyer, confirmed that the claim of his death was false.
